meanings.definition: The thick layer of skin below the epidermis.
meanings.sent1: The dermis provides support and strength to the skin.
meanings.sent2: She moisturized her dermis to keep it healthy.
meanings.sent3: The dermis decided to take a nap under the epidermis.
meanings.sent4: His determination was as strong as the dermis beneath his skin.
meanings.sent5: The dermis, like a sturdy shield, protects the body from harm.

meanings.sent1: The dermis contains blood vessels and nerve endings.
meanings.sent2: The inner dermis is sensitive to touch.
meanings.sent3: The dermis threw a surprise party for the epidermis.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him ran deep, like the inner dermis of her skin.
meanings.sent5: The dermis, a hidden treasure, holds the secrets of the skin.
